reviews.review_text: Facilities are clean and place is relatively well taken care of. Good culture and the place doesn t get as rushed as more budget gyms I ve been to in the past. I have done personal training with Vish - would recommend as you get to learn proper form, technique, have a workout plan. Plus with the personal training, there s a seperate room dedicated for it so you don t have to wait or worry about rush in the general gym faculties itself. The place has decent amount of parking as well including an underground. Overall would recommend this gym and it s personal training services.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hello Ayaan, Thank you so much for taking the time to leave us such a positive review! Were thrilled to hear that you are enjoying your experience at Golds Gym Langley and that our facilities are clean and well-maintained. Its also great to know that youve had a positive personal training experience with Vish and that our separate room for personal training sessions has been convenient for you. We truly appreciate your recommendation of our gym and our personal training services. If you have any further feedback or suggestions, please dont hesitate to reach out to us at (604) 882-4653. Thank you for choosing Golds Gym Langley, and we look forward to serving you in the future. Best regards, [Your Name] Golds Gym Langley

reviews.review_text: I had a great experience at Gold s Gym Langley! I encountered a minor issue, but Dylan quickly resolved it with outstanding customer service. Thanks to him, my visit was smooth and enjoyable. Highly recommend this gym!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: We sincerely apologize for any inconvenience you experienced with our gym. We understand your frustration and we apologize for the lack of communication and customer service you received. We take customer service very seriously and we are committed to providing a positive experience for all our members. Please be aware that our staff hours are until 6:00 pm on Sunday and hence no one could attend you on that day at 7pm. However will be more than happy to discuss and assist you in resolving this matter. Please give us a call at (604) 882-4653 to reach out directly to our management team. Thank you for your continued loyalty to Golds Gym, and we value you as a member of our community. Your feedback is essential in helping us improve our services and customer experience. We appreciate your understanding, and we look forward to the opportunity to resolve this matter and welcome you back to Golds Gym.

reviews.review_text: Great gym with many equipments, has enough room for everyone to move around freely. Amenities like sauna or steam bath are always accessible.

The Sunday spin class is so fun and inspiring working out with an NCAA athlete. Twice the results from a rec centre atmosphere. The private infrared saunas in change rooms and wood faced lockers bring this gym above grade and membership is cheaper than Plus membership close by. Do yourself a favour and tour Langley - its not the old Golds! So cool!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hello Jan, Thank you so much for taking the time to leave such a wonderful review for Golds Gym Langley! We truly appreciate your kind words and are thrilled to hear that you are enjoying our Sunday spin class and finding it inspiring to work out with an NCAA athlete. We take pride in providing a top-notch facility, including our private infrared saunas and wood-faced lockers, to create a comfortable and enjoyable atmosphere for our members. Its great to know that these amenities have added value to your experience. We truly value your support and cant wait to see you again soon! Best regards, Golds Gym Langley team

reviews.review_text: The gym was really nice, and it s not too busy to the point you have to wait for a long time. Also Justin is very friendly, he was very helpful showing me around. Vish, who did my fitness orientation was very nice and knowledgeable with proper form and exercises.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Edward Mykell, Thank you so much for taking the time to leave us such a positive review! We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed your experience at Golds Gym Langley. Our team works hard to provide a clean and welcoming environment for all our members. We are thrilled that Justin and Vish were able to assist you and make your gym orientation a helpful and informative one. We pride ourselves on having knowledgeable and friendly staff who are always ready to assist our valued members like yourself. If you ever have any questions or need assistance with anything else, please do not hesitate to reach out to us at (604) 882-4653. We look forward to seeing you at the gym again soon! Best Regards, Golds Gym Langley Team

reviews.review_text: I had a wonderful experience at Golds Gym in Langley, BC. The staff is friendly and helpful. They answered any questions I had about the gym. The facility is top notch with clean and modern equipment. Overall, it was an all-around great experience and I would highly recommend Golds Gym in Langley, BC!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi, Francis. Thanks for taking the time to share your positive experience. We truly appreciate it!

reviews.review_text: I had a good experience signing up for this gym. Dylan helped with my membership concerns and gave me best deal after speaking to me in detail. It s important to get to know your customer and provide a better deal and Dylan knows how to do that.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Bushra, Thank you for taking the time to leave us a review! Were thrilled to hear that you had a positive experience signing up at Golds Gym Langley. Were glad that Dylan was able to address your membership concerns and provide you with the best deal possible. Our team always strives to get to know our customers and ensure their satisfaction. If you have any further feedback or need assistance in the future, please dont hesitate to reach out to us at (604) 882-4653. We truly appreciate your support and look forward to seeing you at the gym! Best regards, Golds Gym Langley Management

reviews.review_text: I recently visited Golds Gym Langley and was thoroughly impressed with the facility. The gym is incredibly clean and well-maintained, with up-to-date equipment that made my workout comfortable and safe. The staff were very knowledgeable and friendly, and I appreciated the welcoming atmosphere they created. They were also able to answer all my questions and help me with my fitness goals.

Gold gym langley has the best trainers! Especially i learned from Albert and i could acheive my personal goal within 6 months! He taught me a lot of things and also gave me a really good program. Going to the gym was not something that i enjoyed before but now im really happy to workout and follow the program that Albert gave me. I see the progress and also the challenges. Albert also helped me to find and fix the mobility issues of my body that might cuase potential injury as i workout more and harder.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hello Jung Sanghoon, Thank you so much for taking the time to write such a positive review about Golds Gym Langley! Were thrilled to hear that you had a great experience with our trainers, especially with Albert. Its wonderful to know that he helped you achieve your personal goals within just 6 months and provided you with a tailored program. Were glad to hear that you now enjoy going to the gym and that you see progress and challenges in your workouts. Its fantastic to know that Albert was able to address any mobility issues and prevent potential injuries as you push yourself harder. We truly appreciate your kind words and hope to continue exceeding your expectations in the future. If you need any further assistance, please feel free to reach us at (604) 882-4653. Keep up the great work and enjoy your fitness journey! Best regards, Golds Gym Langley

reviews.review_text: Great gym great vibes. All the things you would want. Just wish they were open at 6am on the weekends instead of 7am. But over all I can t complain :)
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Greetings Ben, thank you for taking the time to leave us a positive review! Were glad to hear that youre enjoying the gym and the overall atmosphere. We appreciate your suggestion about opening earlier on the weekends and will take it into consideration for future improvements. Thank you for choosing Golds Gym Langley. If you have any further questions or concerns, please dont hesitate to reach out to us at (604) 882-4653.

reviews.review_text: Been a member here for a couple years now, absolutely love the staff and the gym itself is amazing. The facilities are great and I get lots of use out of their pool/hot tub. Definitely recommend checking it out!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for taking the time to leave us a positive review! We are delighted to hear that you have had a great experience at our gym and appreciate your kind words about our staff. We hope to continue to provide you with the best possible service and support on your fitness journey. Thank you again for your review, and we look forward to seeing you at Golds Gym Langley soon! Best regards, Sidak- Gym Manager

reviews.review_text: A very well managed, well equipped and well maintained facility. Instructors and coaches are excellent.  Sidak (manager) is awesome.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for your positive feedback, Ayush! Were thrilled to hear that you found our facility well managed, equipped, and maintained. Our instructors and coaches work hard to provide excellent service. I appreciate your kind words about myself. If you have any further feedback or questions, please dont hesitate to reach out to us at (604) 882-4653.

reviews.review_text: Gold s gym Langley is hands down the best gym choice in the Surrey/Langley area. It doesn t matter whether you are looking for a convenient location, expansive training space over floors, ample parking-Gold s meets all of these criteria and more. What I especially find endearing are the super friendly staff who are personable and help create a warm and trusting atmosphere. In fact, Gold s Gym Langley has had a handful of amazing   friendly, personable staff-superstars in my opinion like Cam, David, Dylan, Sophia, Jasmine and Jana!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for your feedback! We are happy to hear you re enjoying your experience with us, happy Lifting

reviews.review_text: One of the best gyms in the lower mainland! I always feel welcomed the machines are super high quality for your workouts, Staff is always amazing and super helpful. Definitely recommend coming here!

Great facility and even better staff. Came in with a back injury trying to find certain machines my physio recommended. No other gym had it, some didn t even bother checking. Ashton from Langley location went above and beyond and not only helped me find the machines I was looking for, but was kind enough to show me other machines that might help as well. I went in thinking of trying a 1-day pass and walked out with having signed up. They made it easy.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi, Aman. We appreciate the kind words and are glad we could provide you with a positive experience!

reviews.review_text: Gold s gym in Langley is top class! Friendly and supportive staff, experienced and committed trainers, quality equipment and a facility that meets all my needs. Love it!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for taking the time to share your positive feedback about our gym! We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your experience with us and that you found our facilities to be great, clean, and equipped with an indoor pool. We pride ourselves on providing a welcoming and friendly atmosphere for all of our members, and were glad to hear that our staff was able to make your experience even better. We strive to maintain a high level of cleanliness in our facilities. Thankyou for being a part of community :)

reviews.review_text: Golds has been a 5 experience for me because of my personal trainer, Michelle Sallee. She is an expert in her field and she got me to a place of wellness I never believed was possible. She has stayed with me through thick and thin.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi, Simi. We re so happy to hear you had a great experience at Golds Gym Langley. Your review made our day. Our team works very hard to keep our members happy, but we can only do it thanks to amazing ones like you! We hope we can keep assisting in the process of reaching your fitness goals. Thank you, Golds Gym Langley Team.

reviews.review_text: Golds has a wide variety of equipment and a large facility so there is always lots of room available. I really enjoy my workouts there.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Greetings Kerry, Thank you for taking the time to share your positive experience with Golds Gym Langley. We are delighted to hear that you enjoy our facility and the variety of equipment we offer. We appreciate your patronage and look forward to seeing you during your next workout. Best regards, Golds Gym Langley (604) 882-4653

reviews.review_text: Great gym, full equipment and the staff is very nice. Had the chance to be guided by Sidek, great experience
Super friendly front of house staff, always smiling. The gym itself is very clean and super modern with up to date equipment. By far the best gym in Langley&near by areas

Been going here for almost 4 years, it is an amazing gym. It s clean, spacious, and the equipment is great! The staff here are always kind, friendly, and truly make me feel at home. Ashton even set me up with an excellent deal, saving me money and gaining more benefits! I had no complaints about my original deal but Ashton went above and beyond to get me the best deal he could. This gym feels like family, especially with staff like Ashton always being so wonderful and welcoming!
Since joining Golds I have been impressed with the facility and staff. I 100% recommend this gym for anyone is the area looking to find an awesome place to workout.
By far one of the best gyms in BC, extremely clean and well maintained equipment by the amazing staff. Good vibes always. Highly recommended.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for taking the time to share your positive experience at Golds Gym Langley. We are thrilled to hear that you find our gym to be one of the best in BC and appreciate your kind words about our staff, equipment, and cleanliness. We strive to provide our members with a clean and welcoming environment to ensure a positive experience every time they visit us. We are delighted to know that you feel this way and that you highly recommend our gym. Thank you again for your review, and we look forward to continuing to provide you with excellent service and support on your fitness journey. Best regards, Sidak- Gym Manager

reviews.review_text: As soon as I walked in the door I was blown away!   Very impressive Facility and the staff there is incredible!  Warm and inviting, my daughter and I had a tour with David, and I was amazed on how organized and clean the gym was.  The equipment is top notch compared to what I m used to and the variety of the equipment was almost mind boggling! Mostly though I love the personal touch the staff have with the patrons and they re always keen to help! I m so happy we signed up and I would recommend to anyone wanting a amazing gym, even just a fitness community to join
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the feedback and review, Becks! Happy to hear you are enjoying the environment. We are glad to have you part of the Golds Gym Langley community. Happy lifting

reviews.review_text: Good space and equipment. Clean facility. The staff are very friendly and get to know their members . I am always welcomed with a smile from Jocelyn at the front!

Gold s Gym is the most inclusive and welcoming gyms I ve been too! The facility caters to all types of gym users and I am very impressed with the amenities available. Ashton made the sign up process and integration very comfortable and easygoing! He gave a thorough tour of the building and went above and beyond to demonstrate areas that would spark my interest. I really recommended if you re considering joining a gym & Ashton goes above & beyond to ensure your questions are answered! He is a very accomplished & informed representative who helps guide you based off your personal goals and needs for a transition and great gym/fitness journey!

Ive been to many gyms in my life across the country and this place is the absolute best! Im a proud member for 4 years.The facilities are very clean and upkept. Tons of machines to choose from in addition to different private spaces to do your own work outs. The staff is hands down the best in the biz; Very polite and always in a good mood. My mornings are always positive thanks to Paiges smile and sense of humour. Ive also had the chance to take some personal training sessions in the last year with Natalie and I can see and feel a huge improvement in my overall look, stamina and mental heath since Ive started. Ive built some pretty solid friendships thanks to Golds. Im really happy I chose this gym 4yrs ago. I would highly recommend Golds Gym Langley to anyone looking to join or switch from another gym.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the feedback and review, Eric. Happy to hear you have been enjoying the facility and environment over the years! We are glad to have you part of the Golds Gym Langley community. We will be sure to let the entire team and Paige know what you said. Happy lifting

reviews.review_text: Very good gym, lots of equipment and the place is well maintained and it is quite clean. Staff were a great help !
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi, Jasmyn. Thank you so much for leaving us a positive review! It means so much to us. We hope to continue bringing value to your fitness experience. - Golds Gym Langley Team.

reviews.review_text: The past month being a Golds Gym member has been an absolute pleasure. The equipment is very superior and the Langley location is super spacious. During the COVID-19 pandemic, their policies are well thought out and I feel very safe working out and going to the amenities. Ashton has been a professional and great representative to his clients. He s very willing to help and he makes sure that you are well taken care of if you need any assistance. 10/10!! I would highly recommend getting a Golds Gym membership :)
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much for the feedback, Maria! Happy to hear that you have been enjoying your experience, we will be sure to let Ashton know what you said! Excited to see you continue reaching your goals here, happy lifting!

reviews.review_text: Always feel welcomed when I come in, the front desk girls are always so kind and smiling. Definitely recommend this gym!!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for taking the time to leave us a positive review! We are delighted to hear that you have had a great experience at our gym and appreciate your kind words about our staff. We hope to continue to provide you with the best possible service and support on your fitness journey. Thank you again for your review, and we look forward to seeing you at Golds Gym Langley soon! Best regards, Sidak- Gym Manager

reviews.review_text: Gym is good, equipment availability is great. One thing about PT - Albert is the best. He always has a work around and tailors exercises and workouts exclusively to fit your need.

Golds Gym has been very accommodating throughout the pandemic, and very clean! Im in nursing so germs are a big no-no and I have observed their cleanliness - very impressed! A big shout out to David as well; he deserves a 5-star rating. Very kind and considerate of his clients - does not make you feel pressured to become a member whatsoever and checks in on you from time to time to make sure youre happy with the services golds gym offers. SO happy I chose this gym!!

With this crazy pandemic, this gym has been my only outlet! Having this gym available to me has mentally and physically kept me sane! They are very clean and always have a staff member on the floor. The front desk is SO welcoming!  The equipment is great. Everything I need in a gym! Y all are doing a great job! Keep up the good work!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for your feedback! We are happy to hear you re enjoying your experience with us, we re excited to watch you achieve your goals with us

reviews.review_text: I go to this place every single day, and thats not an exaggeration. The gym is very well equipped and should suffice to what most people would need. The staff are very friendly and I always end up talking to them for a bit before and after my workouts. Kurt in particular was super helpful when he spotted one of my lifts, huge shoutout to him. The only gripe I have with this place is that the members are very bad at putting away their weights when they are done with them. This isnt the fault of the staff however and they usually try their best to clean up after the messy members.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for the feedback and review, Sean. Happy to hear you are enjoying the environment, and we will take the notes into considerations as we are always trying to improve! Glad to have you part of the Golds Gym Langley community. Happy lifting :)

reviews.review_text: The staff is friendly and helpful. The facility is top notch with clean and modern equipment. All-around great experience and I would highly recommend coming here
Amazing gym, with great equipment and super nice staff :).  Would definitely recommend it, 10/10! Ask for Ashton, he really made the experience great.  Love how highly maintained the hot tub is too
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for the feedback, well be sure to let Ashton know what you said! Happy to hear that youre enjoying your experience so far. Happy lifting

reviews.review_text: Joined Golds Gym about a month ago , I liked how it had a pool as I was paying a lot to swim each month . Read some of the reviews on the pool like it was as cold as a lake unsure what lake that guy swims in nothing wrong with the temperature. Best gym in the area by a country mile and Mary is a great personal trainer

A very special thanks to David Callahan for taking care of me and my friend during our sign up process. He is a very kind and caring individual. Im a returning member thanks to a deal offered by David. Compared to other gyms, i find the staff at this gym quite cooperative and helpful.
one of the best gyms they have a lot of different equipment to use and they re very clean

This has to be the most well-equipped and spacious gym I ve even been to, in over 20 years of working out! With their stringent COVID-19 protocols in place training feels safe, and the booking system means that the gym is never overcrowded. Which in turn means, you rarely have to wait for equipment. The staff are super friendly too. It s so nice to be acknowledged by the trainers who first signed me up each time they see me in the gym. It makes me feel like they weren t just interested in signing me up, but are keen to be a part of my journey here. Also, there was no hard upsell of personal training packages, which is a major turn off in other gyms.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you! We will be sure to let our entire Langley staff know what you said. Happy Lifting

reviews.review_text: Love coming in to this gym! Staff is always super friendly and helpful and equipment and washrooms are always clean!

Great gym! Not too crowded and they have great machines. Unbelievably clean gym. You have to wipe down all your equipment after your done using it with the provided spray. Trainers and staff are great! All in all great gym!

My membership was set up by David who provided phenomenal service and got me set up really quick and easy. The gym is a great size very large and open which is especially beneficial during social distancing.  Many COVID-19 safety measure in place for their staff and gym members. Lots of equipments and different areas based on training level. Definitely recommend.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for your feedback! We will be sure to let David know what you said. Happy Lifting

reviews.review_text: Marco is an incredibly talented and very knowledgeable trainer with years of industry experience. He has excellent communication and makes you feel like you will be able to obtain your goals no matter where you re at in your fitness journey- even if you re training from home. Most trainers with his level of experience will run you into the thousands in coaching fees, but Marco is very affordable. You will have access to years of experience and advice to tap into: at the tip of your fingers. Even though I live in another province and am only able to workout at home currently, I am able to maintain and even reach other fitness goals I didn t think were possible, thanks to Marco. Marco makes you feel invincible no matter where you are geographically or physically. You can still get fit and maintain your health.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the feedback and review, Haley! Happy to hear you are enjoying the environment and personal training here. So glad you have been able to surpass your goals with Marco, we will be sure to let him know what you said! Happy lifting

reviews.review_text: Gold s is a beautiful facility with all of the amenities you could think of! All of the staff are so welcoming and friendly, even through the masks you can see their smiles. During this time with the pandemic it can be scary to be out and around many others, the staff at Gold s are wonderful in ensuring all members set their appointments and their cleaning crew is always on site cleaning after every session. Overall eral it is always a great experience at Gold s.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for your feedback! We are happy to hear you re enjoying your experience with us, well be sure to share what you said with our entire team! Happy lifting

reviews.review_text: Has a great assortment for equipment, the team is amazing- always will to answer any questions or help when needed. The routine of sanitation is also great and pretty much all gym-goers have good gym etiquette. Highly recommend.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the feedback and review, Amber! Happy to hear you are enjoying the environment and community here. Happy lifting

reviews.review_text: Love this gym. Super helpful staff, and a very uplifting environment!!!!!!! I train with Marco. After coming back to the gym recovering from shoulder injuries, he has helped my gain confidence and assists in finding new ways for me to work the areas of concern. This guy knows his stuff, and that makes a huge difference.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the feedback and review, Leanne! Happy to hear you are enjoying the environment and community here! Happy lifting

reviews.review_text: During my travels I have seen a lot of gyms. This one is a good one. Its apparent its been around for a bit as the lockers had their fair share of wear but it was clean and had everything I needed. I arrived around 7:15am on a Saturday morning and had the lifting room to myself (which is nice to not have to wait for a rack). As it got closer to 8:30am, and I was in the main machine area, there were still benches available when the gym started getting busier. I never had to wait for a piece of equipment. Which for me is a big deal. Staff made it easy for a drop in, not an excessive amount of paperwork, just the basics. Well done Golds Gym Langley. When Im in town Ill be back.

Great COVID protocols, membership base is friendly and polite. The GM Dylan always says hi, and Ashton was super helpful in getting my membership set up, while pointing out that my employer also offers a corporate discount rate! Small family business feel with infrastructure of a large chain. Love coming here to stay fit!
Staff are  super friendly and helpful gym atmosphere is awesome too
reviews.response_from_owner_text: We appreciate your kind words, Ricardo! Our staff takes pride in providing a friendly and helpful atmosphere for all our members. Thank you for your positive review!

reviews.review_text: Probably the best gym Ive been to in the lower mainland. I used to use budget gyms alot because of inconsistency in my own schedule but recently decided to dish out in hopes it would motivate me to make time for myself. The facility is great, the staff is super nice and helpful and the equipment is top tier. Unfortunately cant use the pool yet because of Covid but Im looking forward to reaching and maintaining my fitness goals here.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for your feedback! We are happy to hear you re enjoying your workouts with us, we re excited to watch you achieve your goals    hopefully you can experience the pool soon!

reviews.review_text: Excellent facility with various machines and weights. lots of space and light in the gym and staff are extremely accommodating!

Returning members after a few years away, returned to deal with the new staff to sign up the family. Lots of new additions and staff are friendly and professional. Thanks Dylan for taking care of us during the sign up process. Great atmosphere excited to be back with Golds Gym Langley!

Absolutely love Golds Gym Langley! From the amazing array of free weights to machines! How clean the gym is at all times! How safe I feel when walking through the doors when it comes to the gym policies to deal with Covid-19! How friendly and professional the staff are!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the feedback and review, Christian! Happy to hear you are enjoying the environment. We are glad to have you part of the Golds Gym Langley community. Happy lifting

reviews.review_text: I had an amazing experience at this facility! Staff and equipment were both exceptional. Highly recommend checking it out!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for taking the time to share your positive feedback about our gym! We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your experience with us and that you found our facilities to be great, clean, and equipped with an indoor pool. We pride ourselves on providing a welcoming and friendly atmosphere for all of our members, and were glad to hear that our staff was able to make your experience even better. We strive to maintain a high level of cleanliness in our facilities. Thankyou for being a part of community :)

reviews.review_text: My hubby and I started in January and we have been happy at Golds ... Ashtons attention and constant accompaniment makes us feel very good and that they care about people, all the staff are very friendly and always smiling, the theme of the  Hygiene and care is very neat ... there is always a man cleaning every millimeter of the gym and each person carries his cleaning bottle.  The truth is that we feel very safe and we are enjoying every visit to exercise. Alex & Andrea
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much for your feedback, Alex and Andrea! Happy to hear youre enjoying your experience so far, well be sure to let Ashton and the team know what you said! Happy lifting

reviews.review_text: Gave us a great offer on our membership originally, and theyre going through a big reno to make things better.  Hot tub and pool plus steam room a big plus.

My husband and I recently signed up at Golds Gym Mark was super helpful with showing us around the gym and getting us signed up! he explained everything really well and was helpful in answering all of our questions. pool, hot tub and sauna are all great bonuses and the gym rates are super affordable! Definitely recommend checking them out if your looking for a gym membership

David definitely made the whole experience a lot better when I had my orientation. He was great at making you feel welcome and explaining everything you need to know. Great gym with tons of equipment and everything is very high quality.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the feedback and review, Alexandrew! Happy to hear you are enjoying the environment so far. We are glad to have you part of the Golds Gym Langley community. Happy lifting

reviews.review_text: Gold s Gym is such a great facility where the customer service and cleanliness are impeccable. I must make note that Marco Banco definitely makes the experience extra special since he is extremely knowledgeable and personable. He has helped me achieve goals that I never thought were possible. Incredibly motivational! Thank you for believing in me Marco!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the feedback and review! Happy to hear you are enjoying the environment and personal training here. We will be sure to let Marco know what you said! Happy lifting

reviews.review_text: I ve been going here for a few years and love this gym. I ve been to many different gyms and this gym is better in many aspects. The equipment, location, customer service, size, and amenities are all great. And kudos to Dylan for providing amazing service!

This gym is the pinnacle of professionalism & has an amazing staff. Stefanie specifically has been no stranger to going above and beyond her work duties to assist gym members! I remember about a month ago I found myself in a troubling situation in the bathroom, unable to leave I called the front desk in tears. After explaining my issues, and without any hesitation she sprang into action, almost knocking the door off the hinges as she entered in an industrial hazmat suit. She came equipped with an arsenal of supplies and expeditiously eliminated any trace of the prior incident! Even after going above and beyond she still showed immense courtesy by giving me an air freshener for the trip home!! Overall amazing place and I would recommend it to any of my friends!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the feedback and review, Arjun! Happy to hear you are enjoying the environment here. We will be sure to let Stefanie know what you said. We are glad to have you part of the Golds Gym Langley community. Happy lifting

reviews.review_text: Trying to find a new gym.. Of all the gyms i have tried this was the best gym by far. If youre stuck between two options..you will not regret choosing Golds. The quality of the gym is amazing and not only are the staff so nice but the members have their own community altogether! If i hadnt moved so far from the gym I would definitely be working out here!

Marco Banco is an excellent trainer, great communicator and very professional. His training methods and knowledge are remarkable. I cant say enough about his skills and professionalism. The gym itself is great and the equipment is top notch. Thanks
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the feedback and review! Happy to hear you are enjoying the environment. We are glad to have you part of the Golds Gym Langley community. Happy lifting

reviews.review_text: Very beautiful large gym. Our staff spent 8-10 hours a day here for almost a month and noticed it is a large beautiful gym with very respectful staff who are happy and so positive. Andrew Uy manages this location and is an absolute gem! Positive, and really cares about their staff and customers as we observed countless times!
The gym seems great! The staff is super friendly and welcoming, especially Safina. The way she greets all the members is really great. Kudos to the team for keeping such a friendly environment!!

Golds gym Langley is well kept and the staff are very professional. Natalie is an awesome trainer, who knows her job well and capable of providing customized training sessions according to the needs of the individual. Thank you Natalie for your support.

I don t ever leave reviews. I m just here to thank David Callahan for being a kind and professional individual at Golds Gym Langley. Best gym, nicest staff. What else do u need. Go see David. Like now.

One of my athlete friends has suggested me to join Golds Gym. I was very apprehensive at first because almost all gyms offer the same services and claim to be the number one gym. I must say that my experience with this gym was perfect. The trainers constantly motivated me and corrected my posture to achieve best results in less time. The group exercises were an awesome experience. With the right mix of movements I have improved upon my body fitness and strength as well. I wish to continue with them and recommend the gym to anyone.
By far the most entertaining review section of any business that I have ever seen. I give five stars for entertainment.

Love my trainer Anna!! Shes been so supportive and helpful these past few months Ive been training with her. Would definitely recommend booking her if youre wanting to improve on your fitness, no matter what fitness level you are!

Michael went above and beyond as a personal trainer. Not only did he help me to get on the right track in my work outs and a push in the right direction for my diet, he made sure that I would be comfortable and knowledgeable when Im working out alone. Plus he never failed to keep a positive attitude and put a smile on my face after a really hard day.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the feedback and review, Kristen! Happy to hear you are enjoying the environment and personal training here. We will be sure to let Michael know what you said! Happy lifting

reviews.review_text: Amazing facility, knowledgeable staff, the pool is awesome! This gym cares about the community outside its 4 walls, not just inside them. They give back. Having newer workout equipment it really nice, they obviously care about their customers enough to upgrade everything for us!

The gym is nice and always clean. Their covid safety precautions are beyond satisfactory and Safina at the front desk is really friendly and welcoming :) it s nice to see employees going above and beyond to provide great customer service!
The best gym ive been to! Everything is super sanitary and the staff are amazing! Had a great experience talking with Safina as shes extremely welcoming! Def recommend to all my friends! :)
Awesome Experience. The guy named Kurt working there made the visit more pleasant. He put in the extra time and effort to help us all along. Cheers to all the great workouts ahead!

If you re looking for a gym to go to definitely come here!! This gym has so many amazing amenities, sadly not all of them are open due to covid but that s understandable. Super friendly staff and overall good environment. Definitely try the smoothies at core culture too they re delicious!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the feedback, Sydney! Happy to hear youve been enjoying your experience and tasty smoothies! Happy lifting.

reviews.review_text: If you plan on joining this gym, do yourself a favour and book some time with Marco (Personal Trainer). This guy holds me accountable to working hard and has not given up on me even when I have. Great place to work out with some great staff to help achieve your fitness goals.

I recommend their trainer Marco. He is excellent! Marco is very friendly and motivational. He is quite versed on all the training techniques and knows what areas to target for fat burn and weight loss. Overall I rate him an A+ trainer. In addition, the facility is clean, great staff and they are very  friendly and helpful.
Had a great experience setting up my new membership with Ashton today! He was professional and the club looked amazing and like a very safe/clean and organized place to workout during covid.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the feedback and review, Sheyna! Happy to hear you are enjoying the environment and community here. Well be sure to let Ashton know what you said! Happy lifting

reviews.review_text: I recently made the switch to Golds after using many other gyms and can honestly say this is my best experience so far! Speak to Ashton if youre looking to get a great experience during the signup as well!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the feedback, Raveena! Happy to have you as a valued member and well be sure to let Ashton know what you said. Happy lifting

reviews.review_text: Marco has been my trainer for the past few years,  hes very compassionate, knowledgeable and motivating. He endeavors to understand my unique challenges and abilities. I have an ileostomy, Ehlers-Danlos  and Arthritis but hes able to keep up. Over the years the entire staff at Golds Langley has been very supportive and the facilities are kept in good repair and hygienic. The equipment at Golds is top knock. Whether you are a beginner or experienced Golds has a program for you!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the feedback and review, Shannon! Happy to hear you are enjoying the environment and personal training here. We will be sure to let Marco know what you said! Happy lifting

reviews.review_text: ------ Golds Gym Under New Management ----- or at least, it appears that way. I have been in a lengthy process of evaluating whether or not to commit to this gym and have been looking at other options (Fit4Less and Steve Nash are the close ones). I want to dispel any notion that Golds is run even remotely similar to the manner it was before. I had the pleasure of being accommodated by Scott and also some of the upper-management. They explained to me that there was a shift in mind-set and management culture recently after the owners (I assume?) realised that not all staff were handling customers well. They went from  (judging by the comments) pressuring, money-focused sales people to kind, friendly, non-pressuring advisers. I was given a 3 day pass (free) and then he gave me and my wife space to workout! No pressuring, no number-crunching right off the bat. Just freedom to feel out the gym. When I decided to sign up the manager who assisted me took the time to walk-through all the terms, and actually prioritized me understanding everything over getting it over it, she took her time, was friendly and ensured I was okay and on board before moving forward with every section. The contract was reasonable, competitive (compared to similar gyms, not discount gyms), and easy to understand. The locker rooms have had a huge upgrade, have lounging areas with TV;s, nice wood finish lockers, UV Saunas, and the equipment upstairs is well setup and lots of new and expensive equipment as well as the good-old free weights. Apparently they are going 24/7 soon... And getting proper crash-plates and Olympic pads... Time will tell, but even if they dont, I am so pleased with my experience. I walked out of there feeling like I just made a great decision, not feeling like I was talked into something and dumped after the bill. Would recommend any one to seriously consider this place. Its a luxury gym (not a rec centre or discount gym like Fit4Less), so dont complain about the price and compare it to those (No one shops for a Ferrari and complains it doesnt have a Civics price tag). But Steve Nash has been spamming my emails and phone non-stop since I checked it out and I felt like I was just a commission in my sales guys eyes. Go check it out. Experience the new Golds for yourself. You wont be disappointed.

I must say that It saddens me to read about previous negative feedback with Golds Langley because I absolutely love this facility! The ladies at the front desk are very friendly, some have even remembered my name- which I appreciate! I started going to Golds when my son was 3 months old and they won me over because of their a AMAZING childminding team, and care room. All of the caregivers are extremely kind and accommodating and from day one my son warmed up them all and loves coming to the gym. Now he is 1.5 years and to this day he is very comfortable here! MOMS AND DADS IF YOURE LOOKING FOR A FACILITY THAT HAS GREAT CHILDMINDING SO YOU CAN WORK OUT WITH A PIECE OF MIND, THIS IS IT! As for the rest of the gym, I have found over the last year and a bit of being here the gym has improved and they keep looking for ways to improve, constant cleaning and maintenance, different classes etc.. Thank you so much Golds Langley for making me love the gym!
Had a great experience training with Marco Banco at Golds Gym! He was knowledgeable, professional and motivating! I am looking forward to continuing my fitness journey with his help! (:
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the feedback and review, Ayesha! Happy to hear you are enjoying the environment and personal training here. We will be sure to let Marco know what you said! Happy lifting

reviews.review_text: Very good gym, lots of equipment and very large space, the place is well maintained and it is quite clean. Love it.
Great gym, amazing variety of equipment.  Staff are friendly and welcoming.  The manager Dylan does an amazing job of keeping the club running smoothly and enforcing the COVID safety measures.
I think this gym is the best in the lower mainland, hands down. It has two floors of equipment, punching bags, jacuzzi, sauna, swimming pool, and good customer service. Clean too!!

I train with Marco at golds Langley. Marco is really great at studying your sport (if you have one) and providing you with things you need to achieve your best performance. I always look for someone who will push me to do my best and Marco definitely is not afraid to do that! He s super fun and easy to talk to and I love every training session with him.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the feedback and review, Kaila! Happy to hear you are enjoying the environment and personal training here. We will be sure to let Marco know what you said! Happy lifting

reviews.review_text: Marco Banco has been a awesome coach and fitness trainer!! Very professional and has helped me put on muscle, lose weight, improve my cardio and get stronger. He is easy to work with, knowledgeable and very encouraging.  I would recommend Marco  for any beginner wanting to start out in fitness training or anyone just wanting a push, the knowledge and support to get a little further in their fitness journey.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the feedback and review, Nick! Happy to hear you are enjoying the environment and personal training here. We will be sure to let Marco know what you said! Happy lifting

reviews.review_text: Great gym, lots of space and was very clean and COVID friendly. Great place to work out. Staff was awesome. Ashton did a great job helping me out with everything and was fantastic overall.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for the review and feedback, Timothy! Happy to hear youre enjoying your experience so far. Well be sure to let Ashton know what you said! Happy lifting

reviews.review_text: Great gym! Some more preppy style here, staff told me I couldn t put my bag down beside equipment but I still love the gym for its reputation! Mecca of Golds history on sunset beach in California like Arnold

I feel that Gold s has gone above and beyond with their Covid-19 protocols and helped keep everyone healthy by providing an individual disinfectant spray bottle for everyone. Very impressive. Mary, among others, are always friendly and welcoming at the front desk.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the feedback and review, Tanner! Happy to hear you are enjoying the environment so far. We are glad to have you part of the Golds Gym Langley community. Happy lifting

reviews.review_text: Best gym I ve ever been to! Staff is friendly especially Stefanie, she was welcoming, friendly and amazing! Definitely gonna continue coming back! 10/10 recommended this gym!

I ve been training with Marco Banco for 4 months now and I am thrilled with his professionalism, knowledge and style. The guy is a tank so he clearly knows what he s talking about. He s taken me from 230lbs to 205lbs and I no longer look and feel like a blob of chewed up bubblegum. I feel healthier and more athletic and I feel comfortable now knowing that I could probably survive an apocalypse. As I savagely take down a horde of zombies, I ll be thanking Marco for getting me dexterous and battle ready.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the feedback and review, Mylo! Happy to hear you are enjoying the environment and personal training here. Amazing that you have achieved some of your goals here, we will be sure to let Marco know what you said! Happy lifting

reviews.review_text: The service and staff are great. Safina was very welcoming and was really kind! Very clean and sanitary gym as well! Happy to be a member of this facility and have recommended to all my friends amd family!

Marco is a supreme trainer, he got me cut up in a few weeks, I went from 210 to 185 with his guidance. We narrowed down my diet to remove any problem foods and lower calories. Tons of unique bodybuilding and athletic knowledge. Great old school trainer with a lot of knowledge.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the feedback and review, Jesse! Happy to hear you are enjoying the environment and personal training here. We will be sure to let Marco know what you said! Happy lifting

reviews.review_text: Marco Banco is an excellent trainer! When I first began training with him, I was suffering from a torn ACL, and he helped me rehabilitate my knee, then reach my fitness goals and even surpass them. He s knowledgeable and patient, but knows when to be tough to get me to the next level. I highly recommend Marco for anyone looking to improve their fitness.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the feedback and review, Lisa! Happy to hear you are enjoying the environment and personal training here. So glad you have been able to surpass your goals with Marco, we will be sure to let him know what you said! Happy lifting

reviews.review_text: I just recently signed up for a membership at Gold s Langley after having a look at the different facilities in the area. I got a tour from Ashton who was super welcoming in showing me around and helping me find a great deal that works for me :) I also did a complimentary fitness assessment with Cam and very excited to get going on my goals taking advantage of this amazing facility and the expertise of the staff!!
Golds is one of the best gyms in langley. Two employees I think help to make it a great environment are Mary and Marco who are both extremely friendly and supportive.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the feedback and review! Happy to hear you are enjoying the environment so far. We are glad to have you part of the Golds Gym Langley community and will be sure to let Mary and Marco know what you said. Happy lifting
